name: ContextMenu
description: Right-click menu that appears at pointer position with support for touch long-press

accessibility.screenReader: Menu items are announced with role=menuitem. Navigation follows roving tabindex pattern. Type-ahead allows quick item selection by typing. Escape dismisses the menu.
knownLimitations: Touch users may not discover long-press trigger without visual cue

recommendedUsage: Use for contextual actions on right-click (desktop) or long-press (mobile). Provide actions relevant to the clicked element. Include keyboard shortcuts in menu items when applicable.
antiPatterns: Do not use for primary actions that should be visible by default. Avoid hiding critical functionality only in context menus. Do not use as the only way to access features.
